thread.title: World-renowned Hypnotherapist Rachael Meddows Launches Free Fitness App
thread.title_full: World-renowned Hypnotherapist Rachael Meddows Launches Free Fitness App

author: admin
title: World-renowned Hypnotherapist Rachael Meddows Launches Free Fitness App
text:
Companies mentioned in this article: Hypnotherapist Rachael Meddows 
LOS ANGELES, Sept. 3, 2015 /PRNewswire-iReach/ -- Rachael Meddows, world-renowned hypnotherapist and creator of the best-selling Mindful Meditation Hypnosis app, announced today her new free app, Health and Fitness Hypnosis. This powerful new hypnosis app is perfect for anyone interested in health, weight loss, and hypnosis. The app is available on the App Store . 
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20150903/263618 
Meddows has been a practicing hypnotherapist since 2004, where she first opened her practice in the UK. Since then, she has transformed the hypnosis world with her top-selling apps and digital downloads. Meddows believes that everyone should have the ability to experience the power of hypnosis at an affordable cost. 
"I wanted to make this app free because health and exercise are very important to me, and something I believe everyone should have access to. I've used an exciting new format for this particular program, and have found that it's more effective and relaxing than ever. Listeners will experience a more positive mindframe and motivation to make healthier choices, and can listen in the comfort of their own home." 
Meddows has helped millions of people with her powerful hypnosis programs, and this new app is her best yet. Users can expect a soothing listening experience that is user-friendly and able to be customized every time they listen. Within the app, users will find content that's specifically been chosen to help with weight loss, boost energy, and help users make positive and healthy choices. 
Media Contact: Joel Thielke, Motviational Hypnotherapy, 316-250-1141, motivationalhypnotherapy@gmail.com 
News distributed by PR Newswire iReach: https://ireach.prnewswire.com 
SOURCE Hypnotherapist Rachael Meddows
